meanings.definition: To call forth again; to summon back into action or existence.
meanings.sent1: The magician reinvokes the spell to make the rabbit disappear once more.
meanings.sent2: She reinvokes the ancient ritual to protect her village from harm.
meanings.sent3: The teacher reinvokes the story of the brave knight in a fun way to engage her students.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song reinvokes memories of a long-lost love.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking reinvokes feelings of warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: To bring back to mind or memory.
meanings.sent1: The photograph reinvokes memories of a family vacation at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The familiar scent of flowers reinvokes thoughts of springtime.
meanings.sent3: The old song reinvokes memories of dancing in the rain with friends.
meanings.sent4: The sound of laughter reinvokes the joy of childhood birthday parties.
meanings.sent5: The taste of homemade pie reinvokes the feeling of being at grandma's house.
